sentences.en: Seaweed baths can help to detoxify the body.
sentences.cn: 海草浴有助于身体解毒。

sentences.en: Like seaweed, sea grasses are very susceptible to human pollution.
sentences.cn: 和海藻一样，海草很容易受到人类污染的影响。

sentences.en: The skin helps the dragon look like a piece of seaweed.
sentences.cn: 龙的皮肤使它看起来像一片海藻。
